name: Fresh Organic Apples
description: Premium quality organic apples, crisp and sweet. These organic apples are grown without synthetic pesticides or fertilizers, ensuring you get the purest, most nutritious fruit. Perfect for snacking, baking, or adding to salads. Each apple is hand-picked at peak ripeness for maximum flavor and freshness. Rich in fiber, vitamin C, and antioxidants that support overall health and immunity.

name: Banana - Yelakki
description: Fresh Yelakki bananas, naturally sweet and rich in potassium. These premium Yelakki bananas are sourced from the finest farms and known for their exceptional sweetness and creamy texture. Naturally rich in potassium, they help maintain healthy blood pressure and support muscle function. Perfect for breakfast, smoothies, or as a quick energy boost. The thin skin makes them easy to peel and they're ideal for both eating fresh and cooking.

name: Orange - Nagpur
description: Juicy Nagpur oranges, perfect for fresh juice. These premium Nagpur oranges are famous for their exceptional juiciness and sweet-tangy flavor. Grown in the fertile soils of Nagpur, they contain abundant vitamin C and natural sugars that make them ideal for fresh juice extraction. The thin, easy-to-peel skin and seedless nature make them perfect for both juicing and eating fresh. Rich in antioxidants and fiber, they're great for boosting immunity and digestive health.

name: Mango - Alphonso
description: King of fruits - premium Alphonso mangoes from Ratnagiri. These world-renowned Alphonso mangoes are grown in the rich volcanic soil of Ratnagiri and are considered the finest mango variety globally. Known for their golden-yellow color, rich aroma, and unparalleled sweetness, they have a unique fiberless texture that melts in your mouth. Perfect for eating fresh, making juices, or using in traditional Indian desserts. Rich in vitamins A and C, they're a seasonal delight not to be missed.

name: Grapes - Black Seedless
description: Sweet and juicy black seedless grapes

name: Fresh Broccoli
description: Green and nutritious broccoli, perfect for healthy meals. This premium broccoli is harvested at peak freshness and packed with essential nutrients. Rich in vitamin C, vitamin K, folate, and fiber, it's a powerhouse of nutrition that supports immune health, bone strength, and digestive wellness. The tight, dark green florets indicate maximum nutrient content. Perfect for steaming, stir-frying, or adding to salads. Known for its cancer-fighting compounds and antioxidant properties.

name: Tomato - Hybrid
description: Fresh red tomatoes, perfect for cooking and salads. These hybrid tomatoes are bred for exceptional flavor, juiciness, and disease resistance. With their vibrant red color and firm texture, they're ideal for a wide range of culinary uses. Rich in lycopene, vitamin C, and potassium, they support heart health and provide powerful antioxidants. Perfect for making sauces, sandwiches, salads, or enjoying fresh. The balanced sweet-tart flavor makes them versatile in both raw and cooked preparations.

name: Onion - Red
description: Premium quality red onions, sharp and flavorful

name: Potato - Fresh
description: Fresh potatoes, ideal for various Indian dishes

name: Spinach - Fresh
description: Nutrient-rich fresh spinach leaves

name: Whole Milk
description: Fresh whole milk from local dairy farms

name: Amul Cheese Slices
description: Creamy processed cheese slices, perfect for sandwiches. Amul's premium processed cheese slices offer consistent quality and rich, creamy flavor in every slice. Made from high-quality milk and carefully processed to maintain nutritional value, these slices are perfect for sandwiches, burgers, pizzas, and snacks. Each slice is individually wrapped for freshness and convenience. Rich in calcium and protein, they provide essential nutrients while adding delicious taste to your meals.

name: Chicken Breast - Boneless
description: Fresh boneless chicken breast, antibiotic-free. Premium quality boneless chicken breast from healthy, antibiotic-free birds raised on natural feed. Tender and juicy with optimal fat content, perfect for grilling, baking, stir-frying, or making curries. Rich in high-quality protein and essential nutrients like niacin and selenium. Each piece is carefully trimmed and packaged to maintain freshness. Ideal for health-conscious consumers looking for lean protein options.

name: Greek Yogurt - Plain
description: Thick and creamy Greek yogurt, high in protein

name: Butter - Unsalted
description: Pure unsalted butter, perfect for cooking and baking

name: Chicken Breast - Boneless
description: Fresh boneless chicken breast, antibiotic-free

name: Fish - Rohu
description: Fresh Rohu fish, cleaned and ready to cook

name: Mutton - Curry Cut
description: Premium mutton curry cut pieces, tender and flavorful

name: Basmati Rice - Premium
description: Long grain premium basmati rice, aromatic and fluffy

name: Wheat Flour - Whole Wheat
description: Finely ground whole wheat flour, perfect for chapatis

name: Moong Dal - Yellow
description: Premium quality yellow moong dal, splits easily

name: Coca Cola - Original
description: Classic Coca Cola, refreshing carbonated drink

name: Real Fruit Juice - Orange
description: 100% pure orange juice, no added preservatives

name: Mineral Water - Bisleri
description: Pure mineral water, hygienically packed

name: Lays Potato Chips - Classic Salted
description: Crispy potato chips with perfect salt seasoning. Lays brings you the perfect balance of crispy texture and just the right amount of salt in every chip. Made from premium potatoes and cooked to golden perfection, these chips offer that satisfying crunch you love. Perfect for snacking, parties, or as a side with your favorite meal. Each chip is thinly sliced for maximum crispiness and flavor distribution. A timeless classic that never disappoints.

name: Oreo Original Biscuits
description: Creamy chocolate sandwich biscuits, perfect with milk. The iconic Oreo biscuit features two chocolate wafers with a sweet, creamy filling that creates the perfect chocolate sandwich experience. Each biscuit is designed for optimal dunking in milk or coffee. Made with high-quality ingredients and the signature Oreo taste that has delighted generations. Perfect for snacking, desserts, or crushing for cookie crusts. A versatile treat that brings joy to every bite.

name: Kurkure Masala Munch
description: Spicy and crunchy corn puffs with masala flavor

name: Surf Excel Detergent Powder
description: Powerful detergent for tough stains, keeps clothes bright

name: Harpic Toilet Cleaner
description: Powerful toilet cleaner that kills 99.9% germs

name: Colgate Toothpaste - Total
description: Complete protection toothpaste with 12 benefits
